FuncDef: The reset hwtacacs-server accounting-stop-packet command clears statistics about HWTACACS accounting-stop packets. The reset hwtacacs-server accounting-stop-packet command clears statistics about HWTACACS accounting-stop packets.

ParaDef.Info:
Clears statistics about all accounting-stop packets.
-

Clears statistics about accounting-stop packets with the specified IP address.
The value is in dotted decimal notation.
